Class OpenPGP

java.lang.Object
  to.networld.schandler.card.BasicCard
      to.networld.schandler.card.OpenPGP
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICard
public class OpenPGP
extends BasicCard

Before you can read out the values you have to call the "selectFile" method.

Author:
Alex Oberhauser
